forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: finally decided to make a board.

comments.text: just thought it would be worth putting my progress somewere that isn't in my sotl room's. they will still be worth finding though as the content here will be much less interesting.
if anybody wants to know what i am doing, this is the place to look. weeky updates will be shown here and will let anybody know that i'm still online at least.
you will also see how dumb i am when it comes to learning new things. i am yet to figure out why "when consumed then show board progress of a hobbo" doesn't work.
i'm actually fairly inconsistant when it comes to updates, but it'll be either because i need to dump info or i can't get on because im away.
the cookie i made for the board works now so i guess it was just some sort of server issue? either way i probably don't have to worry about that anymore.
future plan for board: keep current world updates at the top. change design to feature '2d' art on the front (behind buttons).

thread.latestCommentText: future plan for board: keep current world updates at the top. change design to feature '2d' art on the front (behind buttons).
